enriched.description: Early-stage biotech company focused on thermal biology and heat-responsive therapeutics. Develops novel approaches to treat cancer and other diseases using thermal biology principles. Part of the Cambridge biotech ecosystem with emerging research focus.
enriched.tech_keywords: thermal biology, heat-responsive therapeutics, oncology

enriched.description: Cambridge-based oligonucleotide therapeutics company developing antisense and siRNA-based treatments. Focuses on targeting disease-causing genes with synthetic RNA molecules for precision medicine applications.
enriched.tech_keywords: oligonucleotides, antisense, siRNA, gene therapy

enriched.description: Bioconjugation chemistry and drug delivery company providing services and technologies for antibody-drug conjugates (ADCs) and other therapeutics. Supports pharmaceutical companies in developing next-generation therapies.
enriched.tech_keywords: bioconjugation, ADCs, protein engineering, drug delivery

enriched.description: Medical imaging AI company applying machine learning to diagnostic imaging for early disease detection. Uses deep learning to analyze medical images and support clinical decision-making in ophthalmology and other specialties.
enriched.tech_keywords: computer vision, deep learning, medical imaging, ophthalmology

enriched.description: Drug discovery company focused on DNA repair mechanisms and synthetic lethality. Develops small molecule inhibitors targeting DNA damage response pathways for cancer and other diseases.
enriched.tech_keywords: DNA repair, synthetic lethality, oncology, small molecules

enriched.description: Thermal biology company investigating temperature and heat as therapeutic targets. Develops treatments for diseases related to thermal dysfunction and cellular temperature regulation.
enriched.tech_keywords: thermal biology, temperature regulation, cell biology

enriched.description: Stem cell biology company specializing in induced pluripotent stem cells (iPSCs) and differentiated cell products. Provides research tools and cell models for disease modeling and drug screening.
enriched.tech_keywords: iPSCs, stem cells, cell differentiation, disease modeling

enriched.description: AI-driven drug discovery company using machine learning and knowledge graphs to identify novel therapeutic targets. Combines artificial intelligence with biomedical data to accelerate drug development for serious diseases.
enriched.tech_keywords: machine learning, knowledge graphs, drug discovery, NLP

enriched.description: Contract research organization (CRO) providing preclinical development services for pharmaceutical and biotech companies. Offers toxicology, pharmacokinetics, and safety assessment services.
enriched.tech_keywords: preclinical testing, toxicology, pharmacokinetics, CRO

enriched.description: Cellular programming company developing induced pluripotent stem cell (iPSC) technology and cell engineering. Provides tools and platforms for creating any human cell type for research and therapeutic applications.
enriched.tech_keywords: iPSCs, cellular programming, cell engineering, regenerative medicine

enriched.description: Protein array technology developer enabling parallel analysis of protein interactions and diagnostics. Provides microarray platforms for biomarker discovery and therapeutic development.
enriched.tech_keywords: protein arrays, proteomics, biomarkers, microarrays

enriched.description: Protein engineering and production services company specializing in recombinant protein manufacturing. Provides custom protein production, purification, and characterization services to biotech and research organizations.
enriched.tech_keywords: protein engineering, recombinant proteins, purification, manufacturing

enriched.description: Spatial biology and cell imaging company developing platforms for analyzing cell populations in tissue context. Uses multiplexed imaging to map cell states and phenotypes for research and diagnostics.
enriched.tech_keywords: spatial imaging, cell biology, image analysis, multiplexing

enriched.description: Cell therapy company developing regenerative medicine products for tissue repair and disease treatment. Focuses on cell manufacturing and therapeutic applications in unmet medical areas.
enriched.tech_keywords: cell therapy, regenerative medicine, tissue engineering, cell manufacturing

enriched.description: Cell and gene therapy company developing novel therapeutic approaches for serious genetic diseases. Combines cell therapy with gene editing for targeted disease treatment.
enriched.tech_keywords: gene therapy, cell therapy, gene editing, genetic diseases

enriched.description: Diagnostic testing company focused on early disease detection and patient monitoring. Develops and delivers diagnostic tools for clinical applications.
enriched.tech_keywords: diagnostics, disease detection, biomarkers, testing

enriched.description: Drug discovery and development company targeting protein misfolding and neurodegenerative diseases. Develops small molecule and biologics therapies for conditions like Parkinson's and Alzheimer's.
enriched.tech_keywords: neurodegeneration, protein misfolding, drug discovery, therapeutics

enriched.description: Immunology company developing therapeutics that modulate immune responses. Focuses on epitope-based approaches for cancer immunotherapy and infectious diseases.
enriched.tech_keywords: immunotherapy, antibodies, epitopes, cancer immunology

enriched.description: Gene therapy company developing RNA editing and antisense approaches for genetic diseases. Creates therapies targeting disease-causing genes through post-transcriptional modification.
enriched.tech_keywords: RNA editing, antisense, gene therapy, genetic diseases

enriched.description: Respiratory disease therapeutics company developing small molecule and biologic therapies. Focuses on lung diseases including cystic fibrosis and other chronic respiratory conditions.
enriched.tech_keywords: respiratory disease, small molecules, biologics, pulmonology

enriched.description: Bispecific antibody company developing dual-targeting therapeutics for cancer and inflammatory diseases. Creates engineered antibodies that simultaneously engage two different antigens.
enriched.tech_keywords: bispecific antibodies, immunotherapy, protein engineering, oncology

enriched.description: Neuroscience-focused drug discovery company developing treatments for neurological and psychiatric disorders. Uses genetic and molecular approaches to identify novel therapeutic targets.
enriched.tech_keywords: neuroscience, genetic approaches, drug discovery, neurology

enriched.description: Immunology company developing cell therapy and immunomodulation approaches for autoimmune and inflammatory diseases. Focuses on harnessing immune mechanisms for therapeutic benefit.
enriched.tech_keywords: cell therapy, immunomodulation, autoimmune disease, biologics

enriched.description: Liquid biopsy diagnostics company developing blood tests for early cancer detection and monitoring. Uses circulating tumor DNA analysis to enable non-invasive cancer screening.
enriched.tech_keywords: liquid biopsy, ctDNA, cancer detection, diagnostics

enriched.description: Specialty pharmaceutical company developing treatments for serious lung diseases and rare disorders. Operates as an established biopharmaceutical organization with marketed products.
enriched.tech_keywords: pulmonology, rare diseases, specialty pharma, therapeutics

enriched.description: Antibody drug development company using transgenic mouse technology to generate fully human antibodies. Develops therapeutics for oncology and immunological disorders.
enriched.tech_keywords: antibody engineering, human antibodies, immunotherapy, oncology

enriched.description: Biotech company focusing on therapeutic development and drug discovery in emerging areas. Part of the Cambridge biotech ecosystem with evolving research programs.
enriched.tech_keywords: drug discovery, therapeutics, biotech

enriched.description: Drug discovery company developing targeted therapies for genetic diseases. Focuses on precision medicine approaches for rare and inherited conditions.
enriched.tech_keywords: genetic diseases, precision medicine, drug discovery, genomics

enriched.description: Longevity and aging biology company developing therapeutics to address age-related diseases. Focuses on understanding and targeting aging mechanisms for extended healthspan.
enriched.tech_keywords: longevity, aging biology, healthspan, geroscience

enriched.description: Mitochondrial disease therapeutic company developing treatments for metabolic and mitochondrial disorders. Uses mitochondrial biology to create targeted therapies.
enriched.tech_keywords: mitochondrial disease, metabolic disorders, cell biology

enriched.description: Gene therapy company developing mosaic virus vectors and gene transfer platforms. Creates therapies for genetic diseases using advanced viral delivery systems.
enriched.tech_keywords: gene therapy, viral vectors, genetic diseases, gene delivery

enriched.description: Drug discovery company focused on novel molecular approaches to therapeutic development. Develops therapies across multiple disease areas using advanced chemistry.
enriched.tech_keywords: drug discovery, molecular chemistry, therapeutics

enriched.description: Global imaging and optical technology company with research and development operations in Cambridge. Develops microscopy, imaging, and precision optics technologies for scientific research.
enriched.tech_keywords: microscopy, optics, imaging systems, precision instruments

enriched.description: Life science industry organization and network providing support to Cambridge biotech companies. Acts as a cluster development and advocacy organization for the regional biotech ecosystem.
enriched.tech_keywords: industry organization, networking, cluster development

enriched.description: Specialty pharmaceutical company developing and commercializing therapies for various disease areas. Operates with established manufacturing and distribution infrastructure.
enriched.tech_keywords: specialty pharma, drug manufacturing, commercialization

enriched.description: Women's health biotech company developing therapies for reproductive and fertility disorders. Focuses on unmet medical needs in women's health and reproductive medicine.
enriched.tech_keywords: women's health, reproductive medicine, fertility, therapeutics

enriched.description: Veterinary therapeutics company developing treatments for animal health and disease. Creates therapeutics for companion animals and other veterinary applications.
enriched.tech_keywords: veterinary medicine, animal health, therapeutics

enriched.description: Diagnostic or biotech company developing novel approaches to disease detection or prevention. Operates with emerging technologies in the Cambridge biotech ecosystem.
enriched.tech_keywords: diagnostics, biotech, disease detection

enriched.description: Biotech services or manufacturing company providing support to the biopharmaceutical industry. Offers manufacturing, analytical, or development services to biotech companies.
enriched.tech_keywords: biotech services, manufacturing, development support

enriched.description: Protein-based diagnostics company developing novel diagnostic tests and assays. Uses proteomics approaches for disease detection and patient monitoring.
enriched.tech_keywords: proteomics, diagnostics, biomarkers, protein assays

enriched.description: Drug discovery company using thermal shift assays and biophysical approaches to identify novel therapeutic compounds. Applies thermal profiling technology to drug discovery.
enriched.tech_keywords: biophysics, thermal shift, drug discovery, screening

enriched.description: Clinical trial and pharmaceutical services company providing regulatory, clinical development, and operational support. Serves as a CRO enabling faster pharmaceutical development.
enriched.tech_keywords: clinical trials, CRO services, regulatory support, drug development

enriched.description: Senescence biology company developing therapies targeting cellular senescence in aging and disease. Uses senescence biology to create treatments for age-related conditions.
enriched.tech_keywords: senescence, aging, cell biology, therapeutics

enriched.description: RNA splicing-focused therapeutics company developing antisense and small molecule therapies. Targets RNA splicing mechanisms for treatment of genetic diseases.
enriched.tech_keywords: RNA splicing, antisense therapy, genetic disease, gene therapy
